name: Adamancipator Friends
effectText: Excavate the top cards of your Deck equal to the number of Rock monsters you control +5, and if you do, you can add to your hand 1 excavated Rock monster with a Level equal to or lower than the number of the excavated cards, also place the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Rock monsters.
